EmailTemplate.name: CHN-2017-12 Turbonomic Partner Accreditation Training Denver.Reminder 24 Hour Up
EmailTemplate.subject: [Updated] Tomorrow! Denver Turbonomic Partner Accreditation Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Apologies for the 2nd email, we've included updated information on the agenda and parking details:
Just a reminder that you have registered to attend tomorrow’s Turbonomic Partner Accreditation Training event in Denver, December 13th – 14th, 2017, at the Denver Marriott Tech Center.
Registration and breakfast starts at 8:00am.
Agenda: Wednesday, December 13th, 8:30am – 4:30pm
- 8:00am – 8:30am – Registration & Breakfast
- 8:30am – Event begins
- 5:00pm – Wrap-Up
- 6:00pm – 8:00pm – Dinner - TBD
Thursday, December 14th, 8:30am – 3:30pm
- 8:00am – 8:30am – Registration & Breakfast
Location: Denver Marriott Tech Center 4900 South Syracuse Street Denver, CO 80237 Tel: (303) 779-1100 Event Room: Humboldt Peak
Attire: Casual
Parking: The event will take place in the Humboldt Peak room located on the North side of property. Pull into the hotel parking lot and park to the right side of the hotel.
Bring the parking ticket with you. We will validate it.
In the event your plans have changed and you are unable to attend, please kindly let us know as soon as possible so we can give your seat to another guest.
I look forward to seeing you at this event!
Regards, Laura Nielsen West Coast Channel Manager Cell: 617-763-0513
